body.name: Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser, Non-Foaming Face Wash for Sensitive Skin, Gently Cleanses Face Without Over Drying, Oil-Free, Soap-Free, Fragrance-Free, 12 fl. oz

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 12-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser for sensitive skin effectively cleanses face while leaving skin feeling moisturized and naturally soft all day
Our extraordinarily mild non-foaming cleanser washes away excess oil, dirt, bacteria and makeup and cleanses even the most dry and sensitive skin, including skin with acne, eczema or rosacea

Dermatologist developed for even the most sensitive skin, this daily face wash is formulated with minimal ingredients and is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic so it's gentle on skin and won't clog pores
Clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skin, our hydrating facial cleanser is dye-, soap-, fragrance- and paraben-free and contains no essential oils to cleanse skin without over drying

With its unique skin-nourishing polyglycerin formula, this hydrating creamy face wash cleanses skin and is ideal for sensitive and dry skin care. It makes a great addition to a daily at-home skincare routine
body.description: Product Description Gently cleanse skin and leave it feeling moisturized in just one step with Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser. Dermatologist developed for even the most dry and sensitive skin, this effective, yet extraordinarily mild non-foaming cleanser provides the superior cleansing of Neutrogena in a sensitive skin face wash. With its unique skin-nourishing polyglycerin formula, this extra gentle face wash cleanses even the most sensitive skin, including skin with acne, eczema or rosacea. Our creamy, hydrating cleanser washes away excess oil, dirt, bacteria and makeup leaving skin feeling clean, moisturized and naturally soft. Daily face wash is uniquely formulated with minimal ingredients and is dye-, oil-, soap-, fragrance- and paraben-free. Clinically proven to be gentle on sensitive skin, it is also hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores. This gentle face wash makes a great addition to a daily skincare routine. Brand Story By Neutrogena

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use: Wet face. Pump cleanser into hands and work into lather. Massage face gently. Rinse. Creamy cleanser: Removes excess oil, dirt and makeup Results: Rinses completely clean, leaving skin feeling refreshed - won't over dry skin Formulated for sensitive skin Developed to cleanse even the most dry and sensitive skin

Cleanse Cleanse your skin of makeup, dirt and oil with Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Cleanser Treat Toner and serum can help prep and treat your skin Moisturize Finally, make sure you apply your favorite moisturizer to help hydrate your skin Protect If you’re prepping for the day, don’t forget to apply sunscreen! We recommend using a minimum of SPF 30 to protect your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great No Bells And Whistles Cleanser-Works Great
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser doesn't have any bells and whistles. No fancy packaging. No fancy name. It doesn't have to. I have used this for the last few years. It is great for dry and sensitive skin. As of now it is at a reasonable price. No real smell. What's there is of smell-fresh and clean. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price - staple product
reviews.reviewText: This is a large bottle and great deal. I love how simple and gentle this product is for a sensitive face. This still gives me the pore control I need though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this product for a while now, and it's a game-changer for my skincare routine. The texture is luxurious, and it effectively removes makeup and impurities, leaving my skin feeling refreshed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Skin softening facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I like this facial cleanser because it makes my face feel so soft and smooth after washing it with it. And after that placing the facial day cream on it it’s even better for all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great on my sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser works well for my sensitive skin. No annoying scent, washes and rinses off easily. It leaves my skin soft and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Started out on a bad note with leakage. Learned it's NOT returnable. Just tried anyway and was more disappointed. Not very effective as a cleanser and bummed that it also isn't that moisturizing.Usually love Neutrogena products, this product not so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my second bottle
reviews.reviewText: I really like that it doesn’t dry out my skin. It’s great for mornings! I use this only for mornings since it’s getting cold out, my skin won’t be super dry. I actually started seeing a noticeable difference in my skin once I started massaging the cleanser on my skin for at least a minute or two. My skin cleared up and it started glowing. After, I finish with a hydrating toner. My skin feels soft and supple

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gentle cleanse
reviews.reviewText: This wash lives up to the great reviews. Very gentle and doesn’t cause me to break out at all which is very rare for me

reviews.reviewTitle: Ne surtout pa commander Mauvaise référence reçu 2 fois de suite
reviews.reviewText: J ai reçu la version moussante au lieu de la version crème nettoyante 2 fois de suite vendeur pas sérieux

reviews.reviewTitle: there is no other cleansing like that
reviews.reviewText: very satisfied with the results. Highly recommended

Yo tengo la piel demasiado sensible y más en la parte de los ojos, estaba buscando algún producto que me quite lo graso y al mismo tiempo me hidrate, por mi piel que es mixta. El producto se siente como crema que hace jabón muy suave con mi piel brindando lo que necesito.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 18, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I have dry skin and this really helps with hydration and such. I'm on my second bottle and I really like it. :)
Cleanser is gentle...but not sure if it works well. Hard to tell because of the texture. Prefer the "foaming formula" version.
